sentences.sContent: His obituary was published in one edition of his own newspaper before it was discovered that he was alive.
sentences.sCn: 他的讣文刊登在他自己的报纸版面上之后，才发现他还活着。

remMethod.val: ob(=to向， 往) + it(走， 离去) + uary → 到某地去再相见(是去世的委婉说法) → 讣闻， 讣告

trans.tranOther: an article in a newspaper about the life of someone who has just died
